t: What Is Amazon Family? - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Family allows you to easily manage all your shared services, subscriptions, and digital content from one place. You can manage profiles or linked accounts to share benefits and control access to services and content for kids and teens. Amazon Family allows you to share Amazon benefits ...

t: Create Your Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: When you create your Amazon Family, you'll be prompted to review your content sharing settings through Family Library. If you don't wish to share any content, uncheck all of the boxes next to the content types. You can always go back and choose to share content later.

t: Add an Adult to an Amazon Family - Amazon Customer Service
s: To add an adult to your Amazon Family, you can either send an email invitation or sign up together.
